titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability and feasibility of designating Fort Gaines and Fort Morgan in Alabama as units of the National Park System, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 5/9/2002--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to complete a study regarding the suitability and feasibility of designating Fort Gaines and Fort Morgan in Alabama as units of the National Park System.
